txt.en: Greetings,\nI heard you were back in the area and I have written a letter of commendation for you. Others you helped have pitched in what they could and placed it all in a nice gift box. Be sure to collect and read the letter from the gift box, then seek out Laenin in Celondim or Bogi Deepdelver outside Thorin's Hall.\nLord Dwalin of the Longbeards
